Cell - Class in game.ai.shared.model
The main implementation is derived from http://www.ntu.edu.sg/home/ehchua/programming/java/JavaGame_TicTacToe.html#zz-5.2
Look at class Cell.java for more detail
The idea is that asks the Cell draws when IBoard is changed
